original_text: Send them away, that they may go into the country round about, and into the villages, and buy themselves bread: for they have nothing to eat.
korean_text: 무리를 보내어 두루 촌과 마을로 가서 무엇을 사 먹게 하옵소서

sentences.original_text: that they may go into the country round about
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 주변 시골로 갈 수 있도록

sentences.original_text: for they have nothing to eat
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 먹을 것이 아무것도 없기 때문입니다
